type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.DebugOptions
type.description: * Debug options for Java compilation. Only take effect if {@link CompileOptions#debug} * is set to {@code true}.

method.name: getDebugLevel
method.description: * Tells which debugging information is to be generated. The value is a comma-separated * list of any of the following keywords (without spaces in between): * * <dl> * <dt>{@code source} * <dd>Source file debugging information * <dt>{@code lines} * <dd>Line number debugging information * <dt>{@code vars} * <dd>Local variable debugging information * </dl> * * By default, only source and line debugging information will be generated.

method.name: setDebugLevel
method.description: * Sets which debug information is to be generated.

property.name: debugLevel
property.description: * Tells which debugging information is to be generated. The value is a comma-separated * list of any of the following keywords (without spaces in between): * * <dl> * <dt>{@code source} * <dd>Source file debugging information * <dt>{@code lines} * <dd>Line number debugging information * <dt>{@code vars} * <dd>Local variable debugging information * </dl> * * By default, only source and line debugging information will be generated.
